subject: fix: remove dead code, split React context, fix isMobile
body:
- Remove dead HTML template functions from utils.js that called
  undefined escapeHtml (renderDrilldownSummary, renderUrgencyBar,
  renderImpactBar, renderStatCard, getWorkPatternBadges, getTagStyle)
- Remove dead DOM manipulation functions from state.js
  (renderSectionGuidance, updateAllSectionGuidance)
- Trim global state object to only properties read by utils.js
- Split React context into DispatchContext (stable) and AppStateContext
  to prevent dispatch-only consumers from re-rendering on state changes
- Add useAppDispatch() hook for components that only dispatch
- Change isMobile from useCallback function wrapper to plain boolean
- Consolidate triplicated default filter definition into DEFAULT_FILTERS
- Add explicit radix to parseInt calls
- Build passes: 58 modules, 475KB bundle
